name: Marvel Heroes Omega - X-Men Founder's Pack
name_original: Marvel Heroes Omega - X-Men Founder's Pack
description:
INSTANTLY UNLOCK THE X-MEN, $20 OF Gs AND SIX BONUS COSTUMES AT A STEEP DISCOUNT FOR A LIMITED TIME!

Pack Includes:

- Instant Closed Beta Access

- 6 Playable Heroes: Wolverine, Jean Grey, Storm, Beast, Iceman, Psylocke

- 6 Bonus Costumes: In addition to the six heroes and their default outfits, the X-Men Founder’s Pack includes Wolverine Classic Brown, Jean Grey New X-Men, Storm Astonishing X-Men, Beast Astonishing X-Men, Iceman All-New X-Men and Psylocke Lady Mandarin bonus costumes.

- 10 Combination Boosts: Accelerate your game with a stack of Combination Boosts.

- 2000 Gs: Universally accepted virtual in-game currency for additional heroes, costumes, boosts, and more!

Committed, hardcore players who purchase all five of the Marvel Heroes Omega Founder’s Packs will receive a tremendous dedicated fan bonus that includes:

- Timed Exclusive Symbiote Spider-Man Costume

- Timed Exclusive Hero Iron Fist
